title: June 2022 Visitor Log Records Posted | The White House
content: Today the White House released visitor log records generated in June 2022. This set includes 17,400 records, bringing the total number of records posted to 101,846.These records were posted pursuant to the White House’s policy to voluntarily disclose visitor log records. This release is consistent with the Biden-Harris Administration’s commitment to becoming the first administration to post visitor log records from its first full year in office.To learn more about the policy, read our voluntary disclosure policy. To view visitor log records, view our disclosure page.###
